name: automated-result-portal
description: College Result Portal - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run prod

author: College Result Portal Team
